FO - Fine
Fined £101.00, ACON - Account Consolidated
Account to be consolidated with existing accounts. 
FIDICI - Fined and detained in default of payment until court rises
To be detained in the courthouse until the court rises. Total amount enforced £200.00.
NOCOLLO - No collection order reason
No collection order. Reason: impracticable. Additional reasons: no collection order additional reason.
PDATE - Pay by date
Pay by date. Date to pay in full by: 12/12/2025.
